settings.hero-title: Join the Ninety Percent Affiliate Programme
settings.sub-title: Through the Ninety Percent Affiliate Programme, selected fashion and lifestyle websites can earn a commission by promoting Ninety Percent products.
settings.description:
If your application is accepted, you will be able to earn up to 6% commission on valid sales referred by your website. 

Get started by filling out our affiliate application here.

settings.title: How it works
settings.description: The program is simple, free of charge and rewards you with a commission on every sale generated through your site. You'll be invited to browse the extensive range of Ninety Percent links and banners that you can use on your website. You will also have access to our full product catalogue to promote on your website.

settings.title: What are the benefits of joining?
settings.list-item:
Once accepted into the Ninety Percent Affiliate Programme, you can benefit from the following perks: 

  • Earn 6% commission on all valid sales
  • 30-day cookie period
  • 14 days return policy
  • Full range of category-specific affiliate banners
  • Automated product feed
  • Frequent affiliate communications regarding offers and new products
  • Real-time reporting and sales tracking via our affiliate network partner, Rakuten Advertising.

settings.title: What do I need to do as an affiliate?
settings.list-item:
• Promote Ninety Percent by placing our ads, banners and links on your website.
  • Use our product data feed to promote our products to your readers and visitors.
  •  Share our story and responsible practices to help promote a more mindful approach to shopping and the fashion industry.

settings.title: Apply Now
settings.description:
Fill out the Publisher Registration form. We'll review your site for suitability and get back to you within five business days to let you know the outcome of your application.

If you’re already a registered publisher on the Rakuten Affiliate Network, you’re most welcome to apply directly to our program by searching ‘Ninety Percent’ or our Merchant ID which is 45032 in your publisher dashboard.
